post:
PhotonVPS features an array of High Performance Enterprise VPS solutions to meet the needs of any perspective customer. A wide range of our Enterprise VPS include OpenVZ, Xen, and Windows virtualization which can used for the following:

VPN Tunnel, PPTP, Email Server for Work Group, Intranet System, Database, Game Server MMORPG, General Websites, Webhosting, Reseller Hosting and MORE!

- We do not oversell our services.
- Semi-managed solutions
- Weekly backups on separate hard drive for fast extraction.
- BBB member since 2004, so we value customer satisfaction.
- Disaster Planning N+2 Setup (Hardware, Generators, AC, Routers, Switches, Staff!)
- In-housed Onsite Staff!
